Ingredients : 
		1 white pomfret fish 
		20g sliced ginger 
		10g ginger strands 
		3 chinese mushrooms (cut into strips) 
		50g sour/salted vegetables (cut into strips) 
		4 salted plums 
		2 tomatoes (quartered) 
		salt to taste 
		1 tbsp light soy sauce 
		1 tbsp chinese rice wine 
		50 ml water (optional) 
		5g spring onions strands 
		5g fresh coriander 

Instructions : 
		Cut 20g of ginger into slices and 10g of ginger into strands 

		Cut 3 soaked chinese mushrooms and 50g sour vegetables into strips 

		Quarter 2 tomatoes 

		Cut two slits in the white pomfret right till the bone at an angle on both sides 

		Season with salt to taste 

		Add half of the ginger slices into the cavity 

		On a steaming tray add half the sour vegetables, half the mushroom strips and the remaining ginger slices 

		Add the white pomfret on top 

		Add 4 salted plums 

		Lay the tomatoes around the pomfret 

		Add 1 tbsp light soy sauce 

		and 1 tbsp chinese rice wine 

		Add the remaining sour vegetables, mushroom strips and ginger strands on top 

		Add 50 ml of water (optional) 

		Steam in high heat for 8-10 mins (depending on the size of the fish) 

		Cut spring onions into strands 

		Garnish with spring onions and fresh coriander
